Uses of Class
javax.time.temporal.ISOChrono

  • Packages that use ISOChrono 
    Package Description
    javax.time
    The main API for dates, times, instants, and durations.
    javax.time.temporal
    Access to date and time using fields and units, additional value type classes and base support for calendar systems other than the default ISO.

    • Uses of ISOChrono in javax.time

      Methods in javax.time that return ISOChrono 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISOChrono LocalDate.getChrono()
      Gets the chronology of this date, which is the ISO calendar system.
      Methods in javax.time that return types with arguments of type ISOChrono 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Era<ISOChrono> LocalDate.getEra()
      Gets the era applicable at this date.

    • Uses of ISOChrono in javax.time.temporal

      Fields in javax.time.temporal declared as ISOChrono 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ISOChrono ISOChrono.INSTANCE
      Singleton instance of the ISO chronology.
      Fields in javax.time.temporal with type parameters of type ISOChrono 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Era<ISOChrono> ISOChrono.ERA_BCE
      The singleton instance for the era BCE - 'Before Current Era'.
      static Era<ISOChrono> ISOChrono.ERA_CE
      The singleton instance for the era CE - 'Current Era'.
      Methods in javax.time.temporal that return types with arguments of type ISOChrono 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Era<ISOChrono> ISOChrono.eraOf(int eraValue) 
      List<Era<ISOChrono>> ISOChrono.eras() 
      Method parameters in javax.time.temporal with type arguments of type ISOChrono 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalDate ISOChrono.date(Era<ISOChrono> era, int yearOfEra, int month, int dayOfMonth)
      Obtains an ISO local date from the era, year-of-era, month-of-year and day-of-month fields.
      LocalDate ISOChrono.dateYearDay(Era<ISOChrono> era, int yearOfEra, int dayOfYear)
      Obtains an ISO local date from the era, year-of-era and day-of-year fields.
      int ISOChrono.prolepticYear(Era<ISOChrono> era, int yearOfEra)
